website_summaries.verdict: Choose this styling cream for waves and loose curls, as it is moisturizing without being too heavy. Otherwise, check out competitors.
pros: Hydrates and defines waves and curls, thanks to the rich formula that contains argan oil
Doesn't weigh hair down and makes it soft and shiny
cons: Doesn't define tight curls and coils as well as other products on our list
Doesn't tame all frizz as expected

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Curl Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite product. I used to use the Not Your Mother's Kinky Moves Curl Cream, and I was very pleased with that for years. I decided to try this because I heard it was a favorite. I am definitely obsessed. It gives me soft to the touch and hydrated curls with shine. The smell is also amazing and I always get compliments on the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It can be used alone (as pictured) and it will keep my curls soft and nice. If it's humid out I still use a small amount of gel to finish it off to keep it from frizzing out but I think this is my favorite curl cream by far. I use Moroccan oil to moisturize my curls first, then this, and then gel if needed based on weather. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bruno

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this product. I have used many products on my very curly hair in the past 39 years and NONE come close to making me as happy as this stuff!! It's perfect for my now very short curly hair and I wish I had known of it when my locks were 23 inches longer! It leaves my hair soft to the touch, but very controlled. I have less frizz and no 'crunchy' curls either! And, the next morning I just spritz my hair with water and it's like it's reactivated. This size bottle has easily lasted me 6 months! Just made my reorder and I hope I never have to find another product! LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: McCleskey1813

customer_reviews.title: Soft Touchable Curls
customer_reviews.text: I decided I was done with super short hair and grew it out to chin length. It was a good idea but then I remembered why I went short. I could not control my hair! I called my daughter and asked her what she uses to keep her hair looking so nice and she recommended this product. It is worth every penny of the purchase price. I use a little on towel dried hair and let my hair do what it wants. I get soft curls that are very attractive. I can go out on a windy day and my hair settles into attractively stylish messy curls. And, it smells nice. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Wiese

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this cream, and holy cow I love it and will be re ordering this in the biggest size they have. The smell is light and fresh, and it doesn’t feel sticky. I almost always straighten my hair, but decided I really want to let my hair go natural during covid , so I am giving my locks a breather from all the heat products. This really defined my waves/curls and my hair feels so smooth and not crunchy. I did add a tiny bit of hairspray to hold my frizzies (it’s very humid where I’m at right now ugh) but yeah I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Used then sold.
customer_reviews.text: This murrican oil came open and had been used. It is not as it decribes. When i tried to talk to the sellar he was quite rude. And told Me you get what you pay for. So I M sending back his item and he can use or for something else he can pay for
customer_reviews.author: dia daze

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: If you want soft, natural curls this product is NOT for you! Pros: -Nice bottle/dispenser Cons: -Smells like aftershave -Leaves hair greasy and frizzy all at once (I have thick wavy/curly hair, tried several adjustments to application amount-no success, product sits on hair-does not absorb) -Does not do my natural curl pattern justice! For the price of this product, I expected a much better performance. I gave it 2 months of adjustments to rule out user error and the product still failed 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: My hair looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hair product to enhance my curls. I have short curly gray hair and this creme defines my curls and adds shine. The best thing about this product is the fresh scent like the ocean breeze. Very happy I found this and I highly recommend it. I purchased the smaller size and wish I had chosen the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: butterflies9

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had naturally wavy/curly hair. After chemo, my hair was still wavy (not so much curly) in the back, but the sides tended to go straight - especially the second/third day after shampooing/conditioning. I followed instructions, massaging it through my hair before letting it air dry and Voila! - I have waves in the front again. And if I just mist the front sides with water and add a TINY bit of the product and scrunch, I'm good!
customer_reviews.author: L MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that works for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This was salon-owner-recommended to me in 2015, and I've used little else since. It's the only product that works for my fairly thick, wavy-curly hair. I let my hair air dry about 75%, then work one pump of this through my hair with scrunching motions (if you put it on right after towel-drying--when it's wetter--then your hair will end up a bit curlier). This leaves my hair with nice, loose, natural curls that stay looking good sometimes even into a second day. Also really cuts down on frizz, and leaves very little "crunch"--just enough to keep a nice natural shape. I repeat, this product is the only thing that works for me and it works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the residue
customer_reviews.text: My type of hair is Latina 2B-3c. Long and frizz-prone. Pros: Dries quickly; reduces frizz; can be used alone as a styling product Cons: Scent is strong flowery perfume that doesn’t dissipate; leaves hair feeling crunchy and dry with weird texture (the silicones); Opinion: I personally didn’t like it since it left my hair feeling dry and hard instead of soft and silky. It also felt like I was wearing product, kind of tacky in feeling.
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO STINKY and STICKY
customer_reviews.text: Had purchase another product from Moroccanoil and did not like the overwhelming scent. Took a chance on this one. WAY TO STRONG! I can't wear this on my head. Also very sticky on hair and looks oily. I'm going back to Not Your Mother's Kinky Moves Curl Defining Cream.
customer_reviews.author: jmd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Even in the desert 🐫!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about trying something different..I'm happy I did 🎊. I really like the way this leaves my hair! The smell is fantastic, I don't have to use any gel anymore. My hair stays in place and soft each time I apply Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream after I shower and start my day!!! Now the heat on my hair only does good..we have extremely hot dry weather. Thank you Amazon!!!🌞
customer_reviews.author: Rose 🌹

customer_reviews.title: Very nice results for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I found the results very good: soft defined curls; dry ends seem improved. Just remember the old Brylcreem ad: "A little dab'll do ya'." Rub a small amount on your palms, ''scrunch" it throughout clean damp hair, comb and then dry however you dry. I suppose it could be used more generously as a rinse-out conditioner, but haven't tried that. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the pandemic, I had to let the pixie haircut (that I've had for 20+ years) grow out. Much to my surprise, it was very curly! I read tons of reviews and settled on this product. I absolutely love it. My hair looks great and the smell is so wonderful! People have asked me what scent I'm wearing. The first time that happened, I knew for sure that all I was wearing was deodorant and suddenly realized they must be smelling my hair. I've since purchased the shampoo and conditioner. Love them all!
customer_reviews.author: Joy C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Curl Cream — No frizz!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an amazing high-end product. It was originally recommended by a high-end salon that sold it when I went to get a haircut. It allows you to define the curl while moisturizing so you still have a soft but manageable look. Your girls do not feel crunchy and they also do not feel dry. Soft scent, this is the third time that I purchase it and you just have to use a little bit more in humid weather than you do in fall weather. Works amazingly well!
customer_reviews.author: Andrés &  Mari

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about 2 years. I have fine curly hair but long in length and this product lasts me about 4-5 weeks if I use it daily. It is the ONLY product that dries and doesn’t look crunchy. And the SMELL😍 is amazing. It is cheaper here then at Sephora so that’s also a plus and always arrives within 3-4 days of ordering. I couldn’t give this whole hair line a bigger thumbs up 👏🏼🙌🏼👍🏼 I also use this texture spray and dry shampoo I just love this whole brand
customer_reviews.author: Julia O.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My best friend recommended this curl cream for me to try. I normally use other products, but for the past 2 weeks I have just used this one (and heat protection spray). I have used a diffuser once with this cream, but honestly air drying has been great. The smell is such a plus, it is really hard to find hair products that smell good. I have definitely replaced my other curl creams with this one. I just bought the bigger bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: This creme does magic to my waves
customer_reviews.text: This hair creme is fabulous for my wavy/partial curls. This product does not weigh down my almost thick hair and right after I apply the creme to my wet hair the curls instantly start to recoil. My hair can become dry so this adds the moisture without weighting it down or making it crunchy. Worth spending the extra cash. I hope the conditioner works just as good in it's own department!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works miracles on curly hair, strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair that is usually only naturally frizzy. This product smooths and conditions and makes curly hair manageable. Only reason for 4 stars is the smell because it reminds me of an old lady perfume. If you are sensitive to strong smells this is probably not a good idea for you. Prior to this purchase I had the same brand curl cream and this is an upgrade. Pump is also great feature makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jemneye

customer_reviews.title: The scent was revolting... had to throw it away
customer_reviews.text: This product was fine. I only used it twice and was happy with the way it held my curls the next day without crunch or frizz. But I just couldn't get over the smell! It smelled so STRONG like 1970s aqua net hairspray mixed with moth balls. I don't know why cosmetic manufacturers feel like they have to over fragrance their products. I threw it in the trash after the second use.
customer_reviews.author: shellyATX

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my hair type
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. It smells SO GOOD but it just didn’t work well for my hair. It left it feeling greasy and weighed down, even though it looks good. It holds the curl pretty well, so it could just be my hair type (I have thin and fine hair). I tried mixing it with the gel I usually use and still didn’t love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laud

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, helps curl my hair, and eases my frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is WONDERFUL! In my opinion, the only drawback is it's expensive. BUT, the smell, the creaminess of it are WONDERFUL! I would recommend. Makes me happy just smelling it and using it. My hair is naturally wavy. It doesn't weigh it down. Feels like a wonderful lotion---but doesn't leave a film. Interesting!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Bublitz

customer_reviews.title: Great frizz control and curl definition😊
customer_reviews.text: I have very wavy hair that is frizzy after washing and drying. The Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream is he best thing I’ve never see for my hair. Hi love not having to deal with the frizzies and help hold curls great! Gives awesome beach curl waves!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha LB

customer_reviews.title: This didn't much for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed race, curly, 3C hair. (Those of you in the curly hair community know what this means). This didn't do anything more for my hair than any other product I've tried, and I've tried a LOT of products! I was expecting some REAL curl definition, decrease in frizz, and to give my some shine. None of this really happened. Especially the curl definition part. So, with that said......NEXT!!
customer_reviews.author: rockstarnurse

customer_reviews.title: Product came busted (spring top)
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I’d be on Team Good-Scent, but I have to agree that it’s a little on the overwhelming side. The cream works well for its purpose. I’m glad I tried it but I don’t know if I’d choose to buy it again. The most disappointing and frustrating thing about this product is that it arrived with the spring top busted, so I end up having to put it back together every time to get the product out, which only squeezes more product out, thus wasting a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Zee

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hair product and I needed the small size for travel. I have curly/wavy but thin hair and this makes it look better than any other product- not crunchy, not frizzy. Just smooth, pretty wavy curls. It is expensive, to be sure- but I do think it is worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: Brainstorm

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very overwhelming and lasts for a couple days. Wish it were more neutral or like the argan oil itself. The curl hold is good but the curls are tighter than I would have liked. On day two, I can refresh with water and get the looser curls. Would not buy again because of the scent. If you like strong perfume, it would be fine for you.
customer_reviews.author: CN Vines

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t use because of smell
customer_reviews.text: This product smelled so strong (of old ladies perfume), I could not use it. I tried it once and my husband could hardly breath in the bathroom, and I almost washed my hair again to get it out... :( I really wanted to love it to help with my wavy hair. But I just can’t get over the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ju Young Park

customer_reviews.title: Curls, curls, curls!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time to style my hair. It smells nice, it works well as a curling product. My only issue is that I usually need to add some mouse to get think curls. I have thick hair and naturally curly, but without product VERY frizzy. I usually need a lot of product to make those thick bouncy curls, so depending on your hair, this might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Best product for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have curly, frizzy and unpredictable hair, and over the years, I've tried many different products. After reading a bunch of reviews about this stuff, I decided to give it a go.. and I'm glad I did! It leaves curls defined, springy and soft. It also smells great. I put my wet hair in a microfiber hair towel out of the shower for anywhere from 5 to 20 minutes to soak up excess water. Then, put some of this product in (a small amount goes a long way) and dry my hair with my Sedu hairdryer + universal diffuser attachment. It's the best my curls have ever looked.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah L. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This defining cream does wonders on curls. I’m a male and wanted to grow my hair a little longer. I didn’t know I had so much curl that would flip up. I tried everything. This cream stopped the flip up. I have used the foam and the cream. The cream worked better for me. Came in perfect package and on time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marinedudejoe

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: This was really disappointing. First, I had mistakenly thought it was a non-toxic product but it is not at all. Second, the scent is overpowering and very unpleasant - kind of reminiscent of talcum powder. Third, it only made a noticeable difference on my hair for about thirty minutes after applying. I will definitely not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: J-Bug

customer_reviews.title: Worst curling product ever....
customer_reviews.text: I have curl hair and i’m averse of trying need product for risk of damaging my hair. My stylist recommended moroccanoil curl enhancing shampoo and conditioner so I bought this cream along with them. Worst buy ever. Afterone use my hair has become so brittle, dry and feels like a mop. I have washed my hair twice in the one week yet my hair feels like they have no moisture in it. This product Has Silicon which I didn’t realize before use because I assume it Silicon free and sulphate free like the shampoo and conditioner. A very expensive and damaging mistake. DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daman

customer_reviews.title: The smell is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product! Hair is super soft and the smell is amazing. I use it on rainy or super humid days instead of fighting the frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This cream smells amazing! I bought this after seeing a woman say she used this in her daughter's curly hair in a Facebook page. My daughter is mixed and I've been looking for a good product to use in her hair (which was similar to the daughter's hair in the Facebook post I saw). I am really glad I took a chance and tried this product. It defines and holds her curls so nicely. You only need a little product and it smells incredible! Lots of compliments on the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: 1) smell, yes smell of product is very overpowering and awful. I used a 2 pea size portion and the next day - still can't stand the smell; 2) Made hair dull and did not define any curl whatsoever. Made my hair feel dry. I have used many, many products.....this is not one I will use ever again.
customer_reviews.author: jen49098

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product left my hair as if I put Elmer’s glue in it. Either the seller filled it with a horrible product or Moroccan oil for curls just sux. The smell is so disgusting I can’t even place it.... worst product EVER
customer_reviews.author: Naomi A.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle broke
customer_reviews.text: I loved the conditioner. Instructions say to apply liberally, however too much makes the hair appear greasy. Even though I did like the conditioner, the bottle became seemed to break and would no longer pump. I could not find a stem in the bottle to fix it. So I am not sure if it was a suction bottle or some other system. Since the bottle broke I had to throw out half of the conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: fran magill

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I've used this produxt seveeal times since my stylist used it on my hair. I have always loved my weightless curls after using it; unfortunately this purchase wasn't as satisfying. Perhaps my hair has changed and its not the product but I cant tell it helps my hair at all. No curls like before and it doesn't give lift and bounce to my hair like I once enjoyed. It may be that I don't have the same stylist and my haircut isnt as good as it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: Holds well without being crunchy.
customer_reviews.text: Best curl defining product I have found for my shoulder length natural curl. I have tried quite a few products. Really does define the curls. It holds well but is not crunchy. My second choice is Devacurl. Both add time to defusing hair dry but that is to be expected if drying hair in curly sections vs straitening.
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash
customer_reviews.text: Thus product does NOT work for me. It makes my hair crunchy, it takes my wavy hair completely out from how heavy it is. I used a fair amount the first time I tried it and my hair was horrible and crunchy. So then I thought maybe a little goes a long way and tried it again and got the same results. Do not waste your money. I am glad I bought the travel size first. This is a no no from me.
customer_reviews.author: Calster

customer_reviews.title: Horribly Strong Frangrance
customer_reviews.text: I only tried this product once. It was so-so as far as moisturizing. I honestly could not stand the smell so I had to rinse it out of my hair. My husband and other family members noticed the strong smell as well. It is a heavy perfume that overpowers anything. I will never buy it again and do not recommend it to anyone. The scent does not smell at all natural so it is likely being produced with a lot of strong chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to love this product. It seems like it would be good from the way it went on my hair. But I will be returning it. The smell is super heavy and cloying, like an over age 70 perfume overdose. I have used many hair products, but none that made me feel like I smelled bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cheech

customer_reviews.title: Great product, quite overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product, although I was very disappointed with the size when I got it. There are cheaper and bigger options, that may be of a slightly inferior quality, but don't break the bank. I've used "Seal Rizos Definidos" which works perfectly, and costs literally 4.6x times less (1.18 per Fl/Oz). Again, it's a great product, but IMO not worth being almost 5 times more expensive than others.
customer_reviews.author: jf.armando

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this product through Amazon....but of course, it has gone up in price! (The price though isn't anywhere near the price I had once paid for it in a salon, so I can't complain.)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Rohlfing

customer_reviews.title: If you are a MorrocanOil Fan with curly hair ...
customer_reviews.text: ...this product if perfect! Has the M'Oil magical fragrance. I like that my curls hold without the awful crunchy feel. The small 'travel size' will last much longer than you think. I have thick, curly hair and find that less than a quarter size dollop works for each application. One tube lasts about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is really fine, curly and shoulder length & I usually have a really hard time finding a product that doesn't give me that crunchy look but still has enough hold to keep my hair looking OK throughout the day. This product keeps my hair moisturized and has great hold AND it doesn't weight down my super fine hair. The only con is it has a strong scent (you'll either love or hate it).
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Actually works to define curls
customer_reviews.text: Smells delicious, makes my hair soft and works so well at defining my curls. I have naturally curly hair, but most products I've tried didn't really have impressive results. This actually makes my curls so lovely and they stay nice for days. Not the cleanest product, ingredient wise. I use all natural hair and skin products, likeso the ingredients for me weren't something I would normally use, but it works so well I can overlook it.
customer_reviews.author: Camryn Bell

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly this is awesome for anyone that has any type of curl to their hair. I have wavy hair... I literally refer to my hair as having the "white girl wave". Well, this product does absolutely nothing for it. Won't be purchasing this again. Smells great though.
customer_reviews.author: Fraulein Michaud

customer_reviews.title: You'll love this product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is MAGIC! Well worth the money! Doesn't take much product, I only use about a penny size on very long hair (10 inches past my shoulders). You don't want to use too much, or your hair will be oily. Only dispense a small amount, rub between your hands and gently wipe down the length of your hair starting just off the scalp. You'll love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Smells good!
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. My hair has very loose waves and not a lot of texture, so the MoroccanOil Mousse works a lot better for me! I think this cream would define curlier locks, just doesn’t do much for my already smooth hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: Poor directions in the bottle “generous handful” is not a unit of measurement. My generous handful made my hair feel like I had rubbed oatmeal into my hair. Seriously overpriced and did nothing like it promises. Smells good though, but then, so does my conditioner, so who needs this stuff?
customer_reviews.author: Missy Tee

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but the pump doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and use it every day for my very curly hair. Unfortunately the pump doesn't work and I can't get the product out of this bottle. I can't find a way to get a hold of the seller to ask for a refund. I am hopeful they will reach out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Dawn

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: I've had better experiences with other products in this line... Curl definition was "lackluster" and the scent was somewhat off-putting.
customer_reviews.author: Allana

customer_reviews.title: Sticky residue & dries hair out. Will Not Buy Again.
customer_reviews.text: This product left a very sticky residue on my hands. so it probably did the same on my hair. It was drying and did nothing to enhance or define my curls. The rinse-out conditioner works better than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sassafras/SassafrasfromAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great signature smell, ok curls
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s just my curl pattern that this product isn’t super effective on, but sometimes it just kind of dries on hard and looks kind of clumpy instead of defining curls. I will say, though, the smell is wonderful and it helps with frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Not For Scent Sensitive People/Headache
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is okay for curls/waves, but the scent is so strong I can't use it. It's heavily perfumed and not in a good way. I instantly got a headache after using it and it congested my sinuses. If you have allergies, asthma, or a scent sensitivity I would stay away at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Kiedis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work. Curls dried super loose and straight. Scent I'd OVERWHELMINGLY strong. It's like you poured a Hollister store on your head. For the price, definitely not worth it. Hair did feel soft, BUT the frizz is still there.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best Product, and Ive tried them all
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a salon girl with thick red hair that has a natural curl. This product makes her curls springy and lively. This is the only product that truly enhances the curls in her heavy and thick hair. She is also particular on the overall health of her hair and I can say that this is the only product she has never had a complaint about, and she has tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey t stein

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GET IT MEN OR WOMEN
customer_reviews.text: Me and my boyfriend both use this he has wavy hair and it’s made him beautifully CURLY I have type 2c curls and this is the best! Very light weight, controlled all my frizz, smelled amazing, dried very well didn’t make me look oily nor did it give me any crunch. I will say when drying it gets crunchy but after it dries that is gone. LOVE this product, it’s my everyday!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Curly Hair
customer_reviews.text: Must need for curly hair. I have thick, long, curly hair. I just pump 2-3 pumps in my palms, run together, and scrunch in my damp hair. Then I blow dry with a diffuser. This stuff is awesome and lasts a long time! If you have curly hair, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It works amazing on my hair I have been using this product since last 3 years and just loved it.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Does an average job
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally wavy hair and have had pretty good luck with some curl enhancers in the past, but this one does just an 'ok' job. Smell is great, like all Moroccan oil products. Makes hair oily within a day or two of using as well.
customer_reviews.author: KansasMom

customer_reviews.title: Best for lighter curls
customer_reviews.text: Although this product didn’t work with my curly hair as I would have hoped, it smelt great and didn’t weigh down the curls. Would be more suitable to fine thinner curls or waves versus thick curls
customer_reviews.author: Adrina Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling, but a little drying
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product smells, but it is rather drying for my hair. I Hispanic and White but with VERY dry and VERY curly hair. I have to use some very moisturizing products to keep my hair from looking like a ball of frizz. This product does not work well on its own. I need to add either some Argan oil or a leave in conditioner prior to using this just to keep my hair moisturized and under control.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works even for my sensitive scalp and skin!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one summer after a stylist recommended it and was pleased to see that it is the ONE product like this that does not irritate my scalp or face. I've received many compliments on the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel R. Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: Really smells good
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a product for my daughters hair thats curly and frizzy. It could be this is great for just curly hair but I need something that will also keep frizz out of sight. This does smell good. You do have to be careful not to use to much because then it makes the hair look oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A FAKE , do not buy !!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original product bought in salons !! It's a fake !! I knew it made my hair feel different and the color was solid white when came out of bottle. ALL THE OTHER BOTTLES PURCHASED AT SALONS WERE A CREAMY PINKISH WHITE COLOR WHEN PRODUCT CAME OUT . Then I started looking at the tables they are different!!! THIS IS NOT THE PRODUCT YOU ARE BUYING IN THE SALONS !!! Cream curl cream ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Curls in the world
customer_reviews.text: If you want ready curls? My Hairdresser from Gene Juarez salon, turned me on to this product. Two years, ago. Haven’t been sorry since. Might be a little costly but well worth it. I wear hair natural curly in the Summer and straight in the winter. Only use when I want really big curls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great curly hair setting cream
customer_reviews.text: Of all the curly hair products out there, this is my favorite. Use just a little for a softer hold, use more for a nice firm hold. Has a smell, but it fades pretty quickly and doesn't bother me (I'm sensitive to perfumes).
customer_reviews.author: Irene Hartfield

customer_reviews.title: Great curl conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great for curly and sometimes dry hair
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Otis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 6 years now along with Revlon Professional Equave Hydro Nutritive Detangling Conditioner. It works amazing, after pregnancy I was loosing my curls & my hair would get really frizzy. This product helped tighten my curls & keeps my hair looking shiny & healthy 🙏🏼🥰
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews. I’m glad I did. It works great. I don’t have curly hair. But, with the right gel and some hair spray plus a diffuser... I get great results. This gel is perfect for that. I love everything about it
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curls
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has tight curls and she absolutely loves this product. It leaves her hair soft and her curls look bouncy and not frizzy. Great find. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Homa

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing and Curl Miracle Cream
customer_reviews.text: This curl cream is my saving grace! I have very curly long thick hair. I rake this through my hair after I shower with shampoo and conditioner and then scrunch up the curls. After using a diffuser, my curls are so bouncy and soft. And the smell is AMAZING. I get compliments at least once a day on how good I smell because of this product.
customer_reviews.author: kellyzimmer0109

customer_reviews.title: Love it Love It
customer_reviews.text: If I could afford it, this would be the only curl cream brand i would buy. The more you use the better your hair looks. Smells insanely great. Haven't found anything as good.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get enough of this!
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling and best for your hair. Been using this cream and the oil for years now and have seen such an improvement in my curls, length and overall health’s of the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has EXTREMELY LONG AND EXTREMELY CURLY hair! She loves this product! She puts it in after she washes her hair and it forms nice, pretty curls without frizz!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great product but upgraded version introduced
customer_reviews.text: I used this product until I went to a salon that didn’t have it in stock. They recommended the latest version that was for all curl types. This product is amazing because it produces bigger curls not as tight as the previous one I used to purchase. Both products are from the same manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: HELENE THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: My curls were reborn!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to wear my hair naturally, but was ready to move on from the crunchy curl look I got with the mousse. I found this product and am amazed. It separates and defines my curls and they’ve never looked this beautiful and healthy. It does stay kind of sticky, but doesn’t weigh my hair down. Just don’t touch your hair too much and you won’t get sticky hands. Smells amazing too. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smells amazing and makes my hair pretty but only for the first day. If I sleep on it the next day I have to wash it out when that’s usually not the case. I also use a serum before I apply it or my hair gets a little frizzy. It’s also pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Can get white residue
customer_reviews.text: You have to be light handed with this product, it can leave a residue. Overall I like it, it does a good job but it is over-priced. You can get other products that work just as well for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: MThompson52

customer_reviews.title: Horrible on thin wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: I used a very small amount, and it weighed down my thin wavy hair so much that it almost looks straight. Made my hair look very "stringy." Also the scent is so overpowering I don't even want to use it! Glad I ordered the small size, will be tossing in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: "sidzilla"

customer_reviews.title: Smells HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is HEAVILY perfumed, and smells awful. I couldn’t wait to wash my hair by the end of the day. After washing my hair I could still smell it. It worked OK on my curl, but not great. This went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: mngirld

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Paid all this money hoping it would give my wavy hair some curl but instead it just flattened them out more. Mousse is better. Not even that hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Cream on toweled dryer hair for several years now...my hairdresser recommended it to me. Even though, my hair is not natural curly, it does get wavy in the humid weather of summer. This helps to counter act that...the smell is Amazing! Give it a try, you will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Super product!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! Which in turn saves you money. Take a small amount, rub it through your hair fluff your hair and let dry if you want it natural, or blow dry for a straighter look.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance much too strong
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance of morrocanoil shampoo and conditioner for curl—however the curl defining cream has an overwhelming smell much like a very strong smelling hairspray. I put a small amount on my bangs and couldn’t smell anything else all day. I had to wash my hair and change my pillowcase that night to get rid of it. Maybe won’t be the same for others but I could not tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for permed hair and loved it from the first. I have since used a couple other products that have been suggested to me but I keep coming back to this one. The bottle lasts forever. Product makes your hair a little "crunchy" but just enough for it to hold, not enough for it to be weird or really hard. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! It produces soft curls and the scent is ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It produces soft curls and the scent is wonderful/ exotic. You don't need very much, I use a little larger than a pea size dot of it throughout my slightly above shoulder length hair, much more and I think it would weigh my hair down too much. The 8.5 ounce bottle is going to last a LONG time. I first used it in Virginia while visiting family, the humid winter there created different curls than here in Colorado but still a great result.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Hertneky

customer_reviews.title: Made ends look brittle.
customer_reviews.text: This product made my hair very sticky and it made the ends look brittle. My hair is fine, so maybe it's just not great for fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A small amount will make curls softer & shinier
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this company's curl cream for about 7 years, & saved it for special occasions due to the price. (I also had longer hair.) When they revised the formula to make it lighter (less greasy), I used it every time I washed my hair, & kept cutting it shorter. My hair is not frizzy, stiff, or dry. I've tried other products, but this the best, by far!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find a curling cream since I got my first perm. After two perms and 5 different products, I finally found one that works for me! Gives me beautiful curls. (Forgive the sideways pictures. I can't figure out why they're uploading that way)
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was sticky and hard to smooth through my hair. However, this is what my stylist uses, and she loves it. I just wish I could figure out how to make my hair less crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Maha Gregoretti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curls and smells incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Gives great shape and frizz protection to my medium-sized but thick shoulder length curls. The scent is an amazing exotic kind of floral with good staying power for a hair product; it lasts me all day, especially if I put my hair up while it's not quite fully dry and then take it down later. In fact, I don't even have to put on fragrance if I use this--- yet it's not at all overpowering. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Flower

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several years because it is the best ever! Defines curls without weighing them down. Smells awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: HSKRCHIC

customer_reviews.title: Worst product for any hair
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was no star rating for this product, please don’t buy this one at all if you have curly and frizzy hair, it causes more damage than what you have now
customer_reviews.author: Mrunali Gaikwad

customer_reviews.title: Loves Curls
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my hair dresser and I’ve purchased it repeatedly. It has good curl hold, isn’t ‘stiff’ on your hair, and smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream
product_meta.description:
Size:8.5 Fl Oz

Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream separates, defines, and conditions to bring out the best in naturally curly hair. In addition to increasing bounce and movement, the nourishing argan oil-infused formula combats frizz and imparts shine for curls that look and feel silky smooth. Features an advanced heat-activated technology that provides a curl memory factor to fight frizz and create well-defined, natural-looking, bouncy curls that last Provides lasting enhancement of the curl pattern with gentle, touchable hold. One the most popular products in the Moroccanoil Curl Collection, this all-in-one solution replaces the need for excessive curl products. Fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, an exotic blend of spicy amber aromas and sweet floral notes.

Ingredients:

Key Ingredients : Argan Oil: Extremely rich in tocopherols (Vitamin E), essential fatty acids and antioxidants, this natural oil helps to nourish. 
Polyquaternium-11: An anti-static agent; forms lightweight film around hair that holds curl. 
Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein: Coats porous strands and split ends.

All Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCOL STEARATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, DIMETHICONE, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, CETEARETH-20, ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) KERNEL OIL, HYDROLYZED VEGETABLE PROTEIN PG-PROPYL SILANETRIOL, PPG-1 TRIDECETH-6, POLYQUATERNIUM-11, POLYQUATERNIUM-37, POLYQUATERNIUM-72, PROPYLENE GLYCOL DICAPRYLATE/DICAPRATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, C10-40 ISOALKYLAMIDOPROPYLETHYLDIMONIUM ETHOSULFATE, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM CHLORIDE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, CHLORPHENESIN, PHENOXYETHANOL, EUGENOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL, LINALOOL, HYDROXYISOHEXYL 3-CYCLOHEXENE CARBOXALDEHYDE. MOCDC01

Disclaimer: Ingredients listed may vary slightly from products received. Before use, refer to packaging for most up-to-date in ingredient information and any warnings or instructions. 



BRAND STORY
A story of success, an impulse for innovation and a relentless pursuit of high-performing oil-infused beauty products fashioned an iconic brand: Moroccanoil.

specifications.Manufacturer: Camrose Trading Inc. DBA Fragrance Express
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
